title: Republic Act 10627
subtitle: Anti-Bullying Act of 2013
subject: The Child and Adolescent Learner and Learning Principles

references.content: Cardona, R. S., Reyes, A. S., & Tangalin, M. M. (2015). The bullying experiences and classroom discipline techniques in an Urban National High School in the Philippines: A basis for an Anti-Bullying Program. American International Journal of Contemporary Research, 5(2), 49-52.
DepEd Teachers Club (2013). Implementing Rules and Regulations of R.A.10627 - The Anti-Bullying Act of 2013.
Official Gazette of the Republic of the Philippines (2013). Republic Act No. 10627.
UNICEF Canada (2012). Bullying and cyberbullying: Two sides of the same coin.
